table.caption: Age of Demons Finds
rows: A statuette of a demonic frog-like figure made of an unknown, slimy substance
A dagger with a jagged blade whose handle squirms when held
A jeweled box that screams when opened
A circlet or necklace with prongs that bite into the skin when it's worn
A plain metal ring that causes its wearer to hear incessant, unintelligible whispers
An amulet or figurine covered with a sickly-looking lichen that feels cold to the touch
A piece of jewelry set with a translucent gemstone; an indistinct shape inside the gem moves at random
A weapon made from dark metal that dims the light immediately surrounding it
A die made of petrified bone with mysterious glyphs on the faces
Glass bangles of shifting colors that make no sound striking against each other
A metal scepter topped with a monstrous head much denser than the rest of the scepter, which makes it unbalanced
A medallion or sculpture depicting a {@book Fiend|XMM|3|Fiend} locked in battle with a {@book Celestial|XMM|3|Celestial} or {@book Dragon|XMM|3|Dragon}
table.name: Age of Demons Finds
